page.title: 07CRANHAM WOODS
page.content: Cranham Woods cover several square miles and are owned by Mr. Hicksbeech It is mostly beech trees but there are other types of trees there. There is a stream running through it. On the edge of the wood is Sanatorium Road. There are paths and bridleways through the woods. In one wood there is a clearing called Monks Ditch, there is a lone house with the same name there as well. There are lots of grey squirrels around the woods. There are deer in the woods but they are rarely sighted. There is another woodland on the edge of the common where some deer have been sighted. Cranham Woods have a lot of wildlife, but people aren't allowed to shoot with guns in there, snare s are also not allowed. The minimun fine for leaving litter is Â£100.
